* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: 'Gill Sans', 'Gill Sans MT', Calibri, 'Trebuchet MS', sans-serif;
}

nav {
    position: fixed;
    background-color: black;
    color: lightgray;
    width: 100%;
    height: 40px;
    font-size: 12pt;
}

ul {
    width: 80%;
    margin: auto;
    display: flex;
    padding: 10px 50px;
}

li {
    list-style: none;
    margin-left: 60px;
}

li a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: white;
}

main {
    padding-top: 40px;
}

#banner_one, #banner_two, #banner_three {
    background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,');
    background-size: cover;
    height: 90vh;
    background-position-y: -150px;
    padding-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.banner > * {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

.banner h1 {
    font-size: 40pt;
}

.banner h2 {
    font-size: 26pt;
    font-weight: lighter;
}

.banner a {
    font-size: 16pt;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-decoration: none;
}

#banner_two {
    background-image: url('https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQECib5fq0U4UkpMtLChg5pUKr0EtIwWmLXfg&usqp=CAU');
    background-position-y: -50px;
}

#banner_three {
    background-image: url('https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcT8JNcM1PrjcdCT0aZXhTNt0zzDmqycqaTvcw&usqp=CAU');
    background-position-y: -100px;
}

.category {
    display: flex;
}

.category .box {
    text-align: center;
    height: 80vh;
    width: 50%;
    margin: 10px;
    background-size: cover;
    padding-top: 20px;
    color: white;
}

.category .box a { 
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 14pt;
    padding-top: 20px;
}

#box1 {
    background-image: url('https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcTZjYmB1lttJFJ202OyxjV5K8Xoc4tSTNk8XA&usqp=CAU');
}

#box2 {
    background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,');
    color: black;
}

#box3 {
    background-image: url('https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcTBBInXDtu4DJGuIWNk51XrCVuGWT0sxwBoaw&usqp=CAU');
}

#box4 {
    background-image: url('https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcSnGVELLaYr4lhYrrA9ZPqhRNehLKfSxEZQxw&usqp=CAU');
    color: black;
}

#box2 .label {
    color: red;
    font-size: 14pt;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}

footer {
    background-color: rgba(211,211,211,0.8);
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
}

footer .container {
    width: 80%;
    margin: 20px auto;
    padding-top: 20px;
}

footer .container > * {
    font-size: 10pt;
    color: gray;
}
